column1: nodira-abdulloeva,Nodira,A.,Human Rights Law Specialist | Expertise in legal and policy research,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQHAGKapqJdvLw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1645110996105?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=wma2xLOlwgZfMP1B-wVS4aj9QGyNnXrOmzviOrsNd5w,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E16AQF5R6GlgjkDXQ/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1660625238372?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=R9V4DbYz79kPLtiIV-xw3e78DnilCzQrvCdYBZCpD9s,personal,ACoAACHnhPUB-s0iCSADFXaxX0pdOaBzuuF6C8A,568820981,,"I am a Human Rights Law Specialist with 10+ years of consulting and professional experience managing and participating in numerous projects, programs and initiatives for international organizations and NGOs in Tajikistan, Europe, and Central Asia (UNICEF, OSCE, IOM, DCA&ICCO, UNDP, UN Women, OSI, ICNL, ACLED, Minority Rights Group).

I have a deep interest and knowledge of Human Rights issues in political, civil, and economic spheres with a focus on access to justice and the rule of law, women's rights, gender equality, prevention of sexual and gender-based violence, children‚Äôs rights, migrant workers' rights, and prevention of forced labor and human trafficking.
üü¢ Access to Justice and Rule of Law

column2: International Human Rights Advocacy (UN Treaty Bodies, UPR System)
Prevention of Forced Labour & Trafficking in Human Beings

Team leader in the project 'Together for refugees from Ukraine and with Ukrainians'."", 'title': 'Teamleider ', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 164447, 'name': 'IOM - UN Migration', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF47uUmjljbUA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519881978041?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=1LguttfGhzvDS9h6FRj_4rCjfEeHpydElL5NsxDOe3E', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/iom/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Dushanbe, Dushanbe, Tajikistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'IOM - UN Migration', 'description': '‚Ä¢	Under the overall supervision of the IOM project leads and in close coordination with the staff of the Tajik State Agency ""Centers for consultation and pre-departure preparation of labour migrants"" in Dushanbe (PDO Centre) provide an accurate, detailed and migrant-centric legal review of the contracts between PDO Centre and Pro-Force LTD (a UK based Operator of SWP) and with migrant workers.
‚Ä¢	Provide recommendations on legal contracts between PDO Centre, Operator, and PDO Centre and migrants.', 'title': 'Legal expert on safe migration and the SWP route to the UK', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}, {'location': 'Dushanbe, Dushanbe, Tajikistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'IOM - UN Migration', 'description': 'Job Description:
‚Ä¢	Conduct desk research on migrants‚Äô rights and needs in Tajikistan with a special focus on women affected by migration; 
‚Ä¢	Follow the ongoing events, news, and policy and legislation updates related to migrants‚Äô rights and needs in Tajikistan;
‚Ä¢	Analyze relevant legislations and policies;
‚Ä¢	Collect primary and secondary data using applicable data collection methods;
‚Ä¢	Identify the target group among migrants, relevant civil society organizations (CSO), and state authorities; 
‚Ä¢	Develop a methodology with a number of interviews required among three target groups; 
‚Ä¢	Prepare questionnaires for the target groups;  
‚Ä¢	Conduct surveys among three target groups: migrants, CSOs and state agencies (in person or virtually);
‚Ä¢	Conduct data analysis based on both primary and secondary data;
‚Ä¢	Identify issues related to migrants‚Äô rights and needs in general and gender-based discrimination with regard to access to health care, social services, and decent work conditions in particular; 
‚Ä¢	Elaborate recommendations for state authorities on developing evidence-based policy taking into account migration, human rights, and gender equality considerations;
‚Ä¢	Prepare a monitoring report with recommendations;
‚Ä¢	Present results to relevant stakeholders.', 'title': 'Consultant for conducting monitoring of Tajik migrants‚Äô rights and needs', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 19297, 'name': 'Winrock International', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHtUWTgA-fiEw/company-logo_400_400/0/1637271670388?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=DkzU4a9hAWWBA7syjDAK7FNztv1Mg1ehg-GmzLT5Xx4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/winrock-international/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Kazakhstan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Winrock International', 'description': 'Job description:
‚Ä¢ Develop methodology and tools for the research;
‚Ä¢ Update criteria for selecting the most favorable countries for labor migration from Kyrgyzstan based on the best practices and international standards enshrined in UN and ILO international treaties;
‚Ä¢ Analyze and assess the most favorable countries for the employment of Kyrgyz migrant workers;
‚Ä¢ Based on the developed criteria, review the labor migration situation in countries of Europe (Belgium, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Turkey, United Kingdom), Asia (Japan, Republic of Korea), North America (the US, Canada) and Middle East (UAE).
‚Ä¢ Develop recommendations for government agencies, NGOs, and the private sector in Kyrgyzstan to diversify labor migration and its effective management.

 Deliverables: 
‚Ä¢ Developed profile of 12 countries of  potential destination  for migrant workers with the review of domestic  laws and policies on labor migration, bilateral and regional agreements, national labor law requirements, migrants‚Äô access to social and health systems, protection from exploitation and access to consular protection and diaspora engagement. 
‚Ä¢ A report with recommendations for Kyrgyz government agencies, NGOs, and the private sector to facilitate the legitimate employment of Kyrgyz migrants in the selected countries was prepared (currently under the revision).', 'title': 'Migration Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1929603, 'name': 'A2F Consulting LLC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFqHP1soTrZlQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1675441425384?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wqRGnsudbH5w1GDP3lVftfDAF2VKsz20mafk46M1BLo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/a2f-consulting/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'United States', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'A2F Consulting LLC', 'description': ""Job description:
‚Ä¢ Provide expertise regarding international labor migration patterns, legal framework, and barriers to female migrant workers in Kiribati under the ‚ÄúDue Diligence Support for Activities to Strengthen Women‚Äôs Economic Empowerment in MCC Compact and Threshold Countries‚Äù Project.
‚Ä¢ Conduct a case study on financial literacy and financial inclusion for international labor migrants and their families.

Deliverables: 
‚Ä¢ Conducted case study on best practices on financial inclusion and financial literacy of migrant workers in Asia (Philippines, India, Indonesia) and the Pacific (Fiji, Vanuatu, Kiribati). The report provided a review of national programs and legislation concerning financial literacy and financial inclusion of migrants, described practices of development projects and financial institutions' initiatives, and an overview of the basic principles of financial literacy of migrants, including the gender aspect in the financial inclusion and literacy of women engaged in international migration."", 'title': 'Migration Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 164447, 'name': 'IOM - UN Migration', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF47uUmjljbUA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519881978041?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=1LguttfGhzvDS9h6FRj_4rCjfEeHpydElL5NsxDOe3E', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/iom/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Geneva, Switzerland ', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'IOM - UN Migration', 'description': 'Job description: 
‚Ä¢ Develop methodology and tools for the research and identify countries for the case study in Asia, the Americas, Europe, and Africa.
‚Ä¢ Analyze the definition of ‚Äòdiaspora‚Äô and its legal framework across the globe.
‚Ä¢ Analyze promising practices in diaspora engagement policies and specific political and socio- economic rights in the selected countries.
‚Ä¢ Deliver a presentation of the research methodology at the Global Diaspora Summit 2022.
‚Ä¢ Submit a full report and incorporate review comments and inputs for the publication.

Deliverables: 
A report with promising practices in countries of origin of migrants (Ghana, Mexico, India, Portugal) and
countries of destination of migrants (Germany and Colombia) prepared. The report included information on diaspora engagement, the development of policies and legislation, the reflection of gender issues and the inclusion of transnational identity in legislation. The definition of ‚Äòdiaspora‚Äô at the international and regional level was reviewed, including its evolution. The definition of ‚Äòdiaspora‚Äô at the national level was reviewed, covering 22 countries.', 'title': 'Consultant - Diaspora Engagement: Transnational Identity & Rights ', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2858717, 'name': 'International Center for Not-for-Profit Law (ICNL)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFOwiuD3neX5Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1530117460777?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=xut37l9jpbTv_EYk2YhE94Sw75bJGRqKrPc9SKLNAlw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/international-center-for-not-for-profit-law-icnl-/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Tajikistan (Remote and onsite)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'International Center for Not-for-Profit Law (ICNL)', 'description': ""Job description: 
‚Ä¢ Develop methodology and tools for the research to assess the legal needs of vulnerable and marginalized population.
‚Ä¢ Conduct desk research and fieldwork (key informant interviews and focus group discussions) to map the legal needs of vulnerable and marginalized groups of people (migrants, people with disabilities, women in an unfavorable situation).
‚Ä¢ Prepare a report with recommendations for ICNL's USAID-funded Civil Society Support Program in Tajikistan.

Deliverables: 
‚Ä¢Assistance was provided in selecting the most vulnerable category of the population (women in disadvantaged situations, migrant workers, and people with disabilities) for the ICNL Legal Support Program (LSP). An analysis of the legislation was carried out to determine what guarantees were provided to these vulnerable groups. Based on a review of secondary information, interviews, and focus group discussions, the main barriers to rights and their implementation are identified. 
‚Ä¢Mapping of CSOs was conducted. 
‚Ä¢Based on the analysis and recommendations, LSP developed its training program for CSOs in Tajikistan."", 'title': 'Consultant to Assess Legal Needs of Vulnerable and Marginalized Citizens in Tajikistan', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1861, 'name': 'UNDP', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFIruBoghVYeQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1593438994352?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=2W_FBE_XoALrKcErJ-be5APZrWLFxSpE-Prdp9V8fHE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/undp/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maastricht, Limburg, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'UNDP', 'description': 'National Consultant for Spotlight Initiative Tajikistan (remote and on-site) - UNDP, UN Women, and UNICEF funded project to contribute to the elimination of sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV)
‚Ä¢	Provide consultancy on the Justice component (legislation and policies within criminal, civil, and family law)
‚Ä¢	Conduct the analysis to assess the law policy and practice in accessing women and girls to education, health, labour market, security, and access to justice, and provide recommendations for improvement
‚Ä¢	Perform stakeholder analysis (Judges, Prosecutors, Police, Lawyers, NGOs)
‚Ä¢	Conduct consultations and interviews with: 
o	Stakeholders ‚Äì assess the implementation of the law, identify main barriers, and collect recommendations for a legislation change
o	Target groups - collect information about the main human rights violations

Key achievements:
‚Ä¢	Done a comprehensive analysis of the law and policies in the justice sector of Tajikistan on how the rights of SGBV are guaranteed in this sector, how they are (not) protected by law, or how their needs are (not) taken into account during the investigation and court trial procedures', 'title': 'National Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}, {'location': 'Dushanbe, Tajikistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'UNDP', 'description': 'National Consultant on Rule of Law
‚Ä¢	Assisted in elaborating the report on access to Justice, Concept Note on the Rule of Law Forum, and Rule of Law and Access to Justice Strategy Note for UNDP
‚Ä¢	Assisted International consultant and conducted field research and meetings with Tajik Ministry of Justice, Supreme Court, local experts and CSOs', 'title': 'National Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 19297, 'name': 'Winrock International', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHtUWTgA-fiEw/company-logo_400_400/0/1637271670388?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=DkzU4a9hAWWBA7syjDAK7FNztv1Mg1ehg-GmzLT5Xx4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/winrock-international/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Almaty, Kazakhstan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Winrock International', 'description': 'Migration and Diaspora Consultant - Remote
‚Ä¢	Assessed the capacity of formal/non-formal diaspora groups in Kazakhstan in the prevention of human trafficking and forced labour of migrant workers
‚Ä¢	Evaluated their willingness to work under the Winrock Kazakhstan on Safe Migration Project
‚Ä¢	Wrote the Assessment and Final Reports and developed the Concept Note
‚Ä¢	Conducted the exit validation meeting with Diasporas and CSOs to discuss research findings and the Concept Note', 'title': 'Migration Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1913282, 'name': 'European Federation of Public Service Unions (EPSU)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF45M4GHFz5Pw/company-logo_400_400/0/1579530781095?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=o_p_yd-UgYu8KlAv_tgNJYnucn-bQPR5LlQp5FouCa4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/european-public-service-union-epsu-/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'European Federation of Public Service Unions (EPSU)', 'description': '‚Ä¢	Developed the factsheet on Tajikistan that includes information on a legal basis on the right to call a strike, procedural requirements, legal consequences of participating in a strike, case law of international/European bodies, recent developments in the area', 'title': 'Labour Right Consultant ', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 68753757, 'name': 'Human Rights Centre (Tajikistan)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQElHn60EshigA/company-logo_400_400/0/1610967525889?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=KgrDdN2n9yuGX8gTTMHm8Q1s4Bza8MCHm4AnAVKrU54', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/public-organisation-human-rights-center/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Dushanbe, Tajikistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Human Rights Centre (Tajikistan)', 'description': 'Remote
‚Ä¢	Assessed the draft law ""On Access to Judicial Information"" for its compliance with international obligations, and provided a report with recommendations', 'title': 'Human Rights Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}, {'location': 'Dushanbe, Tajikistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Human Rights Centre (Tajikistan)', 'description': 'Remote
‚Ä¢	Participated in a baseline needs assessment to create a Migrant Resource Centre within the International Centre for Migration Policy Development (ICMPD) Project ""Improving Migration Management in the Silk Routes Countries""', 'title': 'Labour Migration Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}]",[],"['Survey Methodology', 'Presentation Skills', 'Public Speaking', 'Diversification of labour migration', 'Central Asia', 'Legal Writing', 'Diaspora', 'Gender Equality', 'International Human Rights', 'Migration Projects', 'Nonprofit Organizations', 'Legal Assistance', 'Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs)', 'Program Management', 'Policy Analysis', 'Research', 'International Development', 'Analytical Skills', 'International Law', 'Fundraising']",,,
